channel.title: How i make an emote-case?

item.title: How i make an emote-case?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[code]switch (playerEquipment[playerCape]) {

    case #####:
            startAnimation(###);
            break;

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How i make an emote-case?
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

To view what the action case id is, click it a bunch of times on your server and check the runserver window. It will say something like case #: action case #. It’s the action case.

Read full topic

item.title: How i make an emote-case?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The method is using a switch statement.

Example;

case 15698: c.skillCape(); break;

The ‘15698’ would be the actionbutton.

Read full topic

item.title: How i make an emote-case?
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

How i make at the skillcape emote doing the command ::skillcapez?
-DELTA BASe
@ DELTA BASE K?

			case 161:
				// cry emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35C);
				break;

			case 170:
				// laugh emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35D);
				break;

			case 171:
				// skillcape emote

				break;

			case 163:
				// wave emote
					c.setAnimation(0x35F);
				break;

			case 167:
				// beckon emote
